requestBody.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.title: Validate explicit UC need #4 API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Opportunity/deal entity linked to account/contact". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
